body_html:
@fmassa

import tensorflow as tf
tf.enable_eager_execution()
tf.constant(3) / tf.constant(0)

is mostly the same:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
InvalidArgumentError                      Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-1-07abdcaac50d> in <module>()
      1 import tensorflow as tf
      2 tf.enable_eager_execution()
----> 3 tf.constant(3) / tf.constant(0)

google3/third_party/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py in binary_op_wrapper(x, y)
    849     with ops.name_scope(None, op_name, [x, y]) as name:
    850       if isinstance(x, ops.Tensor) and isinstance(y, ops.Tensor):
--> 851         return func(x, y, name=name)
    852       elif not isinstance(y, sparse_tensor.SparseTensor):
    853         try:

google3/third_party/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py in _div_python2(x, y, name)
    982       return gen_math_ops.real_div(x, y, name=name)
    983     else:
--> 984       return gen_math_ops.floor_div(x, y, name=name)
    985 
    986 

google3/third_party/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_math_ops.py in floor_div(x, y, name)
   3011       else:
   3012         message = e.message
-> 3013       _six.raise_from(_core._status_to_exception(e.code, message), None)
   3014 
   3015 

google3/third_party/py/six/__init__.py in raise_from(value, from_value)
    735 else:
    736     def raise_from(value, from_value):
--> 737         raise value
    738 
    739 

InvalidArgumentError: Integer division by zero [Op:FloorDiv] name: div/

and

import tensorflow as tf
tf.enable_eager_execution()
tf.constant(3) / tf.constant([0, 1])

is also basically the same:

body:
@fmassa 

```python
import tensorflow as tf
tf.enable_eager_execution()
tf.constant(3) / tf.constant(0)
```

is mostly the same:

```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
InvalidArgumentError                      Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-1-07abdcaac50d> in <module>()
      1 import tensorflow as tf
      2 tf.enable_eager_execution()
----> 3 tf.constant(3) / tf.constant(0)

google3/third_party/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py in binary_op_wrapper(x, y)
    849     with ops.name_scope(None, op_name, [x, y]) as name:
    850       if isinstance(x, ops.Tensor) and isinstance(y, ops.Tensor):
--> 851         return func(x, y, name=name)
    852       elif not isinstance(y, sparse_tensor.SparseTensor):
    853         try:

google3/third_party/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py in _div_python2(x, y, name)
    982       return gen_math_ops.real_div(x, y, name=name)
    983     else:
--> 984       return gen_math_ops.floor_div(x, y, name=name)
    985 
    986 

google3/third_party/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_math_ops.py in floor_div(x, y, name)
   3011       else:
   3012         message = e.message
-> 3013       _six.raise_from(_core._status_to_exception(e.code, message), None)
   3014 
   3015 

google3/third_party/py/six/__init__.py in raise_from(value, from_value)
    735 else:
    736     def raise_from(value, from_value):
--> 737         raise value
    738 
    739 

InvalidArgumentError: Integer division by zero [Op:FloorDiv] name: div/
```

and 

```python
import tensorflow as tf
tf.enable_eager_execution()
tf.constant(3) / tf.constant([0, 1])
```

is also basically the same:

```

    852       elif not isinstance(y, sparse_tensor.SparseTensor):

    983     else:
--> 984       return gen_math_ops.floor_div(x, y, name=name)
```
